intro.speaker: Selkie
intro.line: Wait, wait! Come back, little bird! No good. It's gone. No fair, flying and stuff. Guess I'll just have to learn to fly too. Doesn't sound too hard. I'll just find the tallest tree around here and jump. Hmm? What's that glowy doorway? Hello? Anyone home? HELLO? ANYONE? Huh, nothing. I'll just take a quick peek inside...

intro.speaker: Selkie
intro.line: What is this place? So many unfamiliar scents! Eeeew. What's THAT smell?

intro.speaker: Selkie
intro.line: Oooh! Where? Oh, you mean me.

intro.speaker: Daichi
intro.line: Must be my lucky day. I can sell a kitsune for a fortune. Dead or alive too, so I might as well make this easy. Dead will be fine.

intro.speaker: Selkie
intro.line: Hey, let's play, mister. And do I smell more of your friends in the wind? I do! Let's ALL play!

intro.speaker: Daichi
intro.line: Everyone! We've got it surrounded! Keep our circle tight—don't let it escape!

intro.speaker: Kaden
intro.line: Can't wait to see my Selkie! Every time I go to her Deeprealm, my daughter is even more amazing!

intro.speaker: Hayato
intro.line: Is that so? And you say she's a kitsune too?

intro.speaker: Kaden
intro.line: Sure thing. Apple doesn't fall far from the tree either—her fur's just like mine. Now it's probably even glossier than the last time I saw her! Hey! Don't get any funny ideas about Selkie. I'm warning you. Don't lay a finger on her. Or else. Which I mean in the worst way possible.

intro.speaker: Hayato
intro.line: You're kidding, right? I know people sometimes hunt your kind. But you do realize that I'm a friend, don't you?

intro.speaker: Ruffian
intro.line: No, no, NO! Get me away from her! She's nuts!

intro.speaker: Kaden
intro.line: Need a hand? Oh, wait. You're probably not the sort that I should help.

intro.speaker: Kaden
intro.line: Another what—a kitsune, here in these woods? By any chance, you don't mean a kitsune girl, do you? Looks like me? Stunning fur? Twinkle in the eye?

intro.speaker: Ruffian
intro.line: What?! Er, yeah. More or less.

intro.speaker: Kaden
intro.line: Ah! I smell Selkie—and more of your kind near her. You intend to put your filthy paws on my daughter. I guess it's time I show you all just what I mean by OR ELSE.

boss.speaker: Daichi
boss.line: We're here to poach fair and square! You won't stop us!

end.speaker: Selkie
end.line: That was fun! But now they're all gone. Just when it was getting interesting!

end.speaker: Kaden
end.line: Hmm. Selkie, you do realise that they were trying to catch you, right?

end.speaker: Kaden
end.line: Whoa, Daughter. It really wasn't. But I'm just glad you're safe.

end.speaker: Selkie
end.line: Hey, hey, Daddy? Are all of your battles like this?

end.speaker: Selkie
end.line: Yay! I can't wait to see more battles! So I'm coming with you.

end.speaker: Selkie
end.line: Wheee! Yes, I am! This is going to be way more fun that being stuck at home.

end.speaker: Kaden
end.line: Battles aren't fun and games, Selkie. They're sad and deadly.

end.speaker: Selkie
end.line: They are? I'm sorry, Daddy. I guess I just got carried away.

end.speaker: Kaden
end.line: Nope. No need to apologize. Just as long as you understand.

end.speaker: Selkie
end.line: You know, since you and your friends saved me... I need to return the favor. That's the right thing to do, isn't it?

end.speaker: Kaden
end.line: Wow, Selkie. You really are growing up, aren't you? Yes, it's good to repay debts.

end.speaker: Selkie
end.line: Then it's settled. I can play with your friends from now on!

end.speaker: Kaden
end.line: Huh? I didn't say you could come. I guess they would like to play with you though. Not too rough now!
